name: biteme-microservices
description: BiteMe microservices architecture for nutritional tracking with AI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run auth:dev" "npm run meals:dev" "npm run ai:dev" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run auth:start" "npm run meals:start" "npm run ai:start" "npm run gateway:start"
scripts.install:all: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../meals-service && npm install && cd ../ai-parser-service && npm install && cd ../gateway-api && npm install && cd ../../client && npm install
scripts.test: cd services/auth-service && npm test && cd ../meals-service && npm test && cd ../ai-parser-service && npm test && cd ../gateway-api && npm test && cd ../../client && npm test

author: Your Name
